title: I made a smurf and barely won anything while levelling up
body:
I made a new smurf today. I levelled it up to level 4. The only thing I got was 300 blue essence, but if you take a look at this image...


https://m.imgur.com/SLoCB0f

It says I was supposed to win :

- 450 blue essence
- 450 blue essence
- 4800 blue essence

What happened to my account ? ðŸ¤”

replies.body:
Hard for me to check and see what happened without knowing the name of the smurf, but I think I see where you might be confused. 

According to that chart, it looks like at level two you would be given the Ashe champion (not 450 BE, it's the *equivalent* of 450 BE)
At level three you'd get Garen, and level four you'd get Brand.

If you want, I'm more than happy to double check to see if the other account got what it should have, but again I'll need that summoner name.

Can I sell champions for blue essences ?
Do I obligatory get 3260 blue essences at level 5 ?

The ones you got at those early levels are champion unlocks instead of shards, so you won't be able to sell them in any way. I did reach out to some of our agents to see if there's any kind of unique thing that could be done here, but so far this is sounding like there's no wiggle room at all =\
